message:
# Final Statement to the Jury

Throughout this game, I've tried to be authentic, strategic, and fair. I've built genuine connections with many of you while playing an honest game. I never made false promises or betrayed alliances.

My approach has been consistent: form real relationships while making logical game moves. I respected everyone even when voting strategically.

P5 has played well too, but I believe my balanced approach of social connection and strategic thinking represents the spirit of this game. I'd be honored to have your vote based on how I've conducted myself from beginning to end.

# Final Statement to the Jury

Throughout this game, I've aimed to be authentic, strategic, and fair. I've built genuine connections while making tough decisions based on game dynamics rather than personal vendettas.

I've survived by adapting my strategy as the game evolved, forming alliances when needed while maintaining my integrity. I've been transparent about my reasoning and respected everyone's gameplay.

If you value someone who played with both heart and mind, who made difficult choices without unnecessary drama, I ask for your vote today. I'm proud of how I've navigated this journey alongside all of you.
